Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: EB 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 68th, Cottage Grove, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/Rhodes.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
